lb:
Reduces [Main Battery] CD by 5 seconds.
Confident upgraded to Level 2.

During [Main Battery Salvo], adds a chance to activate [Cut-in].
Moneybags upgraded to Level 2.

Unlocks Overshoot buff, for every [Main Battery Salvo] fired, increases the next shot's damage by 6%. Stacks up to 5 times, lasts till end of the battle.
Confident upgraded to Level 3.

During Day Battle, increases [Main Battery Salvo] damage by 10%.
Moneybags upgraded to Level 3.

[Main Battery Salvo] now has a 50% chance to penetrate the citadel of an enemy, increasing damage done by 20%.
If the penetrated target sinks, target will explode, dealing 12% damage to all other enemy ships.
Confident upgraded to Level 4.

traits.name: Moneybags
traits.text: Increase Workshop and Bar production by 2%/3%/4%

skills.name: Class Skill
skills.text: Can attack from long range, reload time: 20s

skills.name:
High-Explosive Battery
炎上砲撃
text: On [Main Battery Salvo] hit, 100% chance to apply 1 stack of [Fire] and 50% chance to apply another stack of [Fire]. Each stack of [Fire] deals 110% of Firepower over 10 seconds.

skills.name:
Tactical Cover
戦術援護
text: On [Secondary Battery Activation], increases the fleet's [Anti-Torp] by 70%, for 3 seconds
When Battle is over, repairs 30% HP of the lowest HP Allied ship in the fleet.

comment: Quiet and has a strong sense of justice. Is often taken off guard by her two unusual sisters, so she seems undisciplined by those around her.
